career.name: Indowel
career.title: Web Developer (Contract)
description: Created an online catalog for Indowel to present their wide range of hardware accessories,hinges, tower bolts, screws, handles, and  curtain fittings.
Focused on a structured, easy-to-browse design that highlights both variety and durability.

career.name: Vasu Interio
career.title: Web Developer (Contract)
description: Designed and developed a modern website for Vasu Interio, showcasing their expertise in home interiors, modular kitchens, wardrobes, sofa upholstery, curtains, and blinds.
Focused on a clean, responsive design to highlight their services effectively.

career.name: Dashmesh Agriculture
career.title: Web Developer (Contract)
description: A modern business website for an agricultural equipment company that showcases and sells farming machinery like tipping trailers, spray pumps, multi-crop machines, and land levelers.
